data.title: Top 10 Actors in the World
data.meta_description: Top 10 Actors in the World with Top 10, Technologies, Programming Languages, Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, C++, Go, F#, Rust, Kotlin, Swift, Databases, etc.
data.text:
Actors and actresses with great talent are abundant throughout the world in the film industry. It's difficult to select the top ten actors from such a wide group of actors. The top 10 most popular actors in the world below based on their income, popularity, work and other factors.

1. Dwayne Johnson

Dwayne Douglas Johnson, commonly known as The Rock, is an American actor. He is widely recognised as one of the all-time greatest professional wrestlers. He was born on May 2, 1972. His films have earned over $ 3.5 billion in North America and over $ 10.5 billion globally, which makes him one of the highest-grossing and highest-paid actors in the world. He has won numerous awards for his excellent acting work in the Hollywood industry. The People's Champion, The Brahma Bull, The Great One, The Rock, and Dewey are some of his nicknames. His mother's name is Ata Johnson, and his father is Rocky Johnson.

Filmography of Dwayne Johnson:

He has worked in 44 films.

He has acted in 18 TV shows.

He has Hosted seven shows.

He has acted in 6 Music videos.

Family:

Spouse:

Dany Garcia was his first wife, and they divorced on May 19, 2008.

His second wife is Lauren Hashian, and they got married on August 18, 2019.

Kids:

He has three kids:

Tiana Gia Johnson

Jasmine Johnson

Simone Alexandra Johnson

Relatives:

Peter Fanene Maivia (grandparent)

Tanoai Reed (cousin)

Savelina Fanene (cousin)

Favourite things of Dwayne Johnson:

Favourite food: Donuts, Pizza

Favourite actor: Tommy Lee Jones

Favourite actress: Angela Basset

Favourite colour: Black

Favourite movie: The Godfather

2. Shah Rukh Khan

He is an experienced actor and known as the "King of Romance." He is one of the most well-known actors in the world. He was born on November 2, 1965. Shah Rukh Khan is a global icon who has won many awards for his outstanding acting skills worldwide. His current net worth is $ 740 million. He is also well-known for his on-screen romance with Juhi Chawla and Kajol.

Family:

Kids:

He has three kids:

Aryan Khan

Suhana Khan

AbRam Khan

Wife:

Gauri Khan is his wife; they married on October 25, 1991.

Relatives:

Shehnaz Lalarukh (sibling)

Favourite things of Shah Rukh Khan:

Favourite Food: Tandoori Chicken, Chicken tikka, and Chinese cuisine

Favourite beverage: Pepsi, Coffee

Favourite actors: Dilip Kumar and Amitabh Bachchan

Favourite actresses: 'Mumtaz and Saira Banu

Favourite colours: Blue, Black, and White

Favourite destinations: London & Dubai

Favourite perfumes: Diptyque, Armani, Tuscany and Azzaro.

3. Robert Downey Jr

He is popularly known as Iron Man. This outstanding actor was born on April 4, 1965. He has received numerous awards for his outstanding acting skills. His overall net worth is more than $ 300. The People's Bob and RDJ are some of his nicknames. He is renowned for not being particularly humble.

Family:

Spouse:

Deborah Falconer was his first wife, and they divorced on April 26, 2004.

His second wife is Susan Downey, and they got married on August 27, 2005.

Kids:

He has three kids:

Avri Roel Downey

Indio Falconer Downey

Exton Elias Downey

Relatives:

Allyson Downey (sibling)

Filmography of Robert Downey Jr:

He has worked in 81 films.

He has worked in 6 television shows.

He has hosted two shows.

Trade mark:

Delivering sarcastic jokes while maintaining a stone-faced expression

Frequently portrays charming but arrogant scoundrels

Regularly plays clever but weird characters

4. Leonardo DiCaprio

Leonardo DiCaprio, a famous actor, is ranked number four on the list of the ten most popular actors. He was born on November 11, 1974. He started out acting in very small roles, but he quickly achieved the position of the main man in Hollywood blockbusters. He is the most adaptable actor and continuously appears in the annual list of the highest-paid actors. He is renowned for playing edgy, unique characters. His film Titanic became one of the most well-liked and expensive films ever. He is a well-known actor in Hollywood.

Favourite things of Leonardo DiCaprio:

Favourite film director: Martin Scorsese

Favourite actresses: Meg Ryan, Meryl Streep

Favourite food: Pasta

Favourite beverage: Lemonade

Favourite colours: Green, Black

Favourite sport: Basketball

Filmography of Leonardo DiCaprio:

He has worked in 36 films.

He has worked in 9 television shows.

He has produced 25 films, and six tv shows.

He has worked on a number of blockbuster films, including Total Eclipse, Marvin's Room, Critters 3, Body of Lies, J. Edgar, Celebrity, Romeo and Juliet, The Departed, Blood Diamond, Don't Look Up, Shutter Island, The Beach, The Revenant, etc.

5. Salman Khan

Salman Khan is among the most well-liked Bollywood stars worldwide. In 1965, December 27, he was born. He is very popular due to his personality and kindness. He has won numerous awards for his outstanding performance in films. He has also experienced numerous ups and downs in his career, but he never gave up in despair.

Favourite things of Salman Khan:

Favourite actors: Sylvester Stallone and Govinda

Favourite actresses: Hema Malini

Favourite food: Chinese cuisine, spicy Italian cuisine, Pav Bhaji, Chicken Biryani, Mutton Kebab, and homemade fare

Favourite movies: Casablanca

Favourite colours: Black, White, Grey

Favourite sport: Swimming

Favourite restaurants: China Garden

Favourite perfume: Obsession

6. Vin Diesel

He is a well-known American actor. He was born on July 18, 1967. He is the Fast & Furious franchise's main actor and undoubtedly among the highest-grossing actors of all time. He has received numerous honours for his excellent acting. He has worked in numerous blockbuster films. Diesel began his career in 1990. He established a production company called One Race Films.

Favourite things of Vin Diesel:

Favourite colours: White, Blue, Red

Favourite food: Italian

Hobbies: Acting, writing, reading, travelling

Favourite music: Latin/Techno

Favourite car collections: Corvette

Family:

Kids:

He has three kids.

Pauline

Vincent Sinclair

Hania Riley Sinclair

Parents:

Delora Sherleen

Irving Vincent

Delora Vincent

Relatives:

Paul Vincent (sibling)

Samantha Vincent (sibling)

Kwamé (cousin)

Trade mark:

He always shaves his head

His voice is loud and deep

He used huge, lean boots

Height, weight & physical stats:

Body Measurements: 52-18-34 Inches

Body type: Slim

Height:1.82 m

Shoe Size 10 (US)

Weight:102 kg

Waist:34 Inches

7. Chris Evans

Chris Evans is one of Hollywood's most successful and popular actors. He was born on June 13, 1981. He made his acting debut in the tv program Opposite Sex. His film career began with a wildlife educational film. He is well-known for being one of the most talented actors and most attractive men in the world. He is also among the most well-paid actors in the world.

Height, weight, and physical characteristics:

Body type: Slim

Waist: 33 Inches

Height: 1.83 m

Weight: 85 kg

Filmography of Chris Evans:

He has worked in 57 films.

He has worked in 11 television shows.

He has acted in 1 Music video.

He has worked in a number of blockbuster films, including Cellular, Knives Out, Lightyear, Street Kings, Snowpiercer, Push, Puncture, Free Guy, Gifted, Playing It Cool, The Losers and Fantastic Four.

8. Chris Hemsworth

He is an Australian actor and is currently one of the most well-known and well-liked actors in the world. He was born on August 11, 1983. His acting career was begun with the tv show Home and Away. After entering Hollywood, he started working in the Marvel Cinematic Universe films. He has received numerous awards as a successful actor.

Favourite things of Chris Hemsworth:

Favourite food: Pizza

Favourite movies: Radiohead, Jeff Buckley

Favourite location: United States

Favourite colours: Black

Favourite book: The Hobbit.

Hobbies: Exercise in the gym, read books, swim, and dance.

Height, weight & physical stats:

Body measurements: 48-33-16 inches

Body type: Athletic

Height: 6 feet 3 inches

Weight: 91 kg

Waist: 33 inches

He has worked in a number of blockbuster films, including Extraction, Vacation, Thor: Ragnarok, Doctor Strange, Blackhat, Ca$h, Red Dawn, The Avengers, Star Trek, 12 Strong, Avengers: Endgame, and Rush.

Trade mark:

He has beautiful blue eyes.

His voice is loud and deep.

9. Will Smith

He is among the most popular actors in Hollywood. He was born on September 25, 1968. He worked in a number of big-budget films, like Muhammad Ali. He has won numerous awards for his remarkable acting skills.

Trade mark:

He frequently portrays police officers or agents.

Mostly, he portrays rebellious, witty characters.

He has large ears and an amusing smile.

He frequently features genuine people.

Height, weight & physical stats:

Body measurements: 42-33-16 inches

Body type: Slim

Height:1.87 m

Waist: 33 inches

Favourite things of Will Smith:

Favourite food: Philly Cheesesteak

Favourite beverage: Lemonade

Favourite music: Hip Hop

Favourite colours: Black and Red

He has worked in a number of blockbuster films, including Hancock, Seven Pounds, Hitch, Wild Wild West, Shark Tale, Focus, Aladdin, Bad Boys, Concussion, The Long Run, and Ali.

10. Jackie Chan

He is a Chinese actor who ranks among the top actors worldwide. He was born on April 7, 1954. He has a variety of skills, including singing, screenplay, dancing, and martial arts. He is well-known among people as an action hero and the top martial artist who performs all of the stunts in the movies. He is regarded as the most well-known actor in the world.

Favourite things of Jackie Chan:

Favourite actor: Buster Keaton

Favourite food: Ice cream

Favourite celebrity: Michael Jackson

Trade mark:

He effectively uses common objects as props in fight sequences.

Along with amazing action and stunts, his movies frequently have moments where he is tortured or made to perform difficult tasks.

His movies frequently use slapstick humour.

Wife:

Feng-Jiao Lin

Kids:

Lee-Lee Chan

He has worked in a number of blockbuster films, including Police Story 2, The Myth, Mr Nice Guy, Rush Hour 2, Supercop, Dragon Lord, Operation Condor, Project A, Wheels on Meals, Shanghai Noon, Drunken Master and Armour of God.
